at0000.1.description: *Interaction, contact or care event between a subject of care and healthcare provider(s).(en)
Interaction, contact or care event between a subject of care and healthcare provider(s).
Interacción, contacto o evento de cuidados entre un sujeto de cuidados y uno o más proveedores de cuidados de la salud.
*Interaction, contact or care event between a subject of care and healthcare provider(s).(en)
Interação, contato ou cuidado entre o sujeito do cuidado e profissional(is) de saúde.
Interacción, contacto o evento de cuidado entre un paciente y un proveedor de salud.
Interactie, contact of zorggebeurtenis tussen een onderwerp van zorg en zorgverlener(s).
Interaktion eller kontakt mellan patient och vårdgivare eller vårdhändelse inom hälso- och sjukvården.
Interaktion, Kontakt oder Versorgungsereignis, zwischen einem Versorgungsempfänger und einem Gesundheitsdienstleister.
Hoitohenkilön ja terveydenhuollon tarjoajan välinen vuorovaikutus, kontakti- tai hoitotapahtuma.
Interazione, contatto o evento di cura tra un soggetto di cura e il/i fornitore/i di assistenza sanitaria.
Interaction, contact ou événement de soins entre un sujet de soins et un ou des prestataires de soins.
Interaksjon, kontakt eller omsorgshendelse mellom et individ og helsepersonell.
Interação, contato ou evento de cuidados entre um sujeito e um provedor de saúde.
Interacció, contacte o esdeveniment d’atenció entre un pacient i un o més professionals d'atenció sanitària.

at0027.1.text: Single medication, any route (IV, PO, IM, etc.).
at0027.1.description: Is there a history of use of any medication related to the screening purpose?
at0027.1.comment: In a template, the data element would usually be renamed to the specific question asked. The proposed value set can be adapted for local use by using the DV_TEXT or the DV_BOOLEAN datatypes choice to match each specific use case.

at0027.2.text: Multiple intravenous medications (more than 1 drug, single shots, or continuously)
at0027.2.description: Is there a history of use of any medication related to the screening purpose?
at0027.2.comment: In a template, the data element would usually be renamed to the specific question asked. The proposed value set can be adapted for local use by using the DV_TEXT or the DV_BOOLEAN datatypes choice to match each specific use case.

at0027.3.text: Single vasoactive medication – any vasoactive drug.

at0027.3.comment: In a template, the data element would usually be renamed to the specific question asked. The proposed value set can be adapted for local use by using the DV_TEXT or the DV_BOOLEAN datatypes choice to match each specific use case.

at0027.4.text: Multiple vasoactive medications – more than 1 vasoactive drug, disregard type and dose.

at0027.4.comment: In a template, the data element would usually be renamed to the specific question asked. The proposed value set can be adapted for local use by using the DV_TEXT or the DV_BOOLEAN datatypes choice to match each specific use case.

at0027.2.comment: En una plantilla, l'element de dades normalment es canviaria de nom a la pregunta específica formulada. El conjunt de valors proposat es pot adaptar per a l'ús local mitjançant l'opció de tipus de dades DV_TEXT o DV_BOOLEAN per fer coincidir cada cas d'ús específic.

at0028.1.text: Single specific interventions in the ICU – naso or orotracheal intubation, introduction of a pacemaker, cardioversion, endoscopies, emergency surgery in the past 24 hours, gastric lavage.
at0028.1.description: Is there a history of any past procedures relevant for the screening purpose?
at0028.1.comment: In a template, the data element would usually be renamed to the specific question asked. The proposed value set can be adapted for local use by using the DV_TEXT or the DV_BOOLEAN datatypes choice to match each specific use case.

at0028.2.text: Y a-t-il eu des procédures antérieures ? (2)
at0028.2.description: Existe-t-il des antécédents de procédures antérieures en rapport avec l'objectif du dépistage ?
at0028.2.comment: Dans un modèle, l'élément de données est généralement renommé en fonction de la question spécifique posée. L'ensemble de valeurs proposé peut être adapté à un usage local en utilisant les types de données DV_TEXT ou DV_BOOLEAN pour répondre à chaque cas d'utilisation spécifique.
